episodes.title: Ep. 42 - Will "Smith" Menaker
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Wide dick will joins us again to chat about star trek. What's that? This episode is late you say? Actually, it's not asshole. It's called time zones and maybe I'm on god damn vacation.

episodes.title: Ep. 41 - Cum Town Live
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: The first ever Cum Town Live show at Caroline's on Broadway. It's basically the same format as Funny Moms (the live show we put up on Patreon) except I booked it and it's at Carolines so we use the name of the podcast instead of the name of Adam's gay ass show.

episodes.title: Ep. 40 - Valentimes
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: We have sex with each other on the show as a joke for valentines day. Get it. Like were dating haha. But its jsut a joke. It's okay to suck off your friends if you're doing it in a funny way

episodes.title: Ep. 39 - Petey Dat Boi
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Funny Moms favorite and Bronx favorite and Brooklyn Favorite and New York favorite Petey Dat Boy DeAbreu joins us and we prove once and for all that the podcast isn't racist.

episodes.title: Ep. 38 - Good Prison vs Bad Prison
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: BDF Big dick felix joins us and we try to remember Oz and why it was bad, and we talk about why prison wouldn't be that scary for guys like us. I'm still dying btw. I can't breathe. This is the end. Remember me as a broadcaster. Goodnight and good luck.

episodes.title: Ep. 37 - Goldust Wasn't Gay
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: I almost passed out during this one, luckily the boys kept things going with wrestling chat that I couldn't partcipate in due to both ignorance and medical problems. Please remember me as a Lenny Bruce type or maybe Carlin, thanks.

episodes.title: Ep. 36 - Goatee Era Seagal
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: We go real deep into the latest era of Seagal movies, And we have a sponsor now. Please give me feedback on the fact that we have ads now. Make sure to get mad at me about it. The premium episodes will always be ad free if it bothers you. I'm tired of everyone being mad at me. I just want to pay my fucking rent and waste money on dumb shit.

episodes.title: Ep. 35 - Cum Town Fires Back
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: We go in hard on Compound Media for kicking us out of the Anthony Cumia studios. Adam will personally fight any of the Staten Island salami-mongoloids that pay their bills

episodes.title: Ep. 34 - We Gotta Get Rid Of The TV
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Chapo Genius and all around good boy Wide Dick Willy Menaker joins us as we watch She's All That and slowly come to the realization that the TV is going to destroy the podcast.

episodes.title: Ep. 33 - Ugh. Wardell
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: I guess Brandon invited himself on the podcast again. I was too busy making smoothies to pay attention during this one. I'm sure he brought up some idiot vine star that a man his age (32) shouldn't be obsessing over, ironically or otherwise.

episodes.title: Ep. 32 - Crisis Averted
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: We almost didn't have an episode this week after I forgot to upload the podcast because I got really into Sicario. That movie is tight. It reminds me of my own experiences, as a tier one operator. I was also in 9/11. Merry Christmas everyone.

episodes.title: Ep. 31 - The Birthday Bitch
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: It's my birthday. Or it was my birthday. I'm old now, and I'm sick. And children have to respect me. And I'm allowed to be racist now because I'm old and I beat the Nazis.

episodes.title: Ep. 30 - Copycats
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: We covered a lot on this one. Lindy West. The new Apple products. Lindy again. I got a macbook. I really hate lindy. What the fuck is the Apple Watch anyways? It should be like one of those novelty clocks where every number just says "im gay"

episodes.title: Ep. 29 - Customer Service
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Coming hot off a poorly received premium episode, the boys save face by getting back to basics.

episodes.title: Ep. 28 - How Many Y'all Like Sex
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: I guess Adam and Stav don't know who Chris-Chan is somehow so I explain that to them for about 20 minutes or so. I don't know how anyone could not know who Chris Chan is. I got mad at myself early on for fucking up and not being able to remember a lot of details of mid-nineties television shows so I tanked the episode on purpose by being upset.

episodes.title: Ep. 27 - Adam's Last Stand
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: As the Patreon gets closer to $5000, Adam's days are numbered. We make him defend his position on the podcast by doing another episode where I try to remember the plot of certain movies and inevitably get a detail wrong that belies my own racism.

episodes.title: Ep. 26 - CONGRATULATIONS PRESIDENT HILLARY!!!!
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: The boys offer a big huge yas queen congrats to the slay queen herself who's going to inspire little girls everywhere to be yas queens. Actually its mostly the kind of drunken political commentary you can hear in the waiting area of a Jiffy Lube. Adam gets to talk a lot on this episode because he reads the news like a bitch.

episodes.title: Episode 25 - Playing Pretend
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: The boys reminisce on playing pretend, old games we used to play as kids. This is about as sentimental as the show gets folks. Were trying to do more family retarded, uh excuse me i meant family RELATED content. I want to sell the podcast to Nick Jr. Teach five year olds how to say fuck and shit. And to be cool. To overcome autism and use it to hurt people.

episodes.title: Episode 24 - Ghost Stories
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: We get super scary for holloween (the original spelling) and swap scary stories. Also Stav works out a new character to get back at the guy that hurt his feelings.

episodes.title: Episode 23 - My New Drug Problem
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Well I was up all night the other night to celebrate 3 years sober. Partied a little too hard and I was too tired to keep the energy going on this one. I think we all know we can't rely on Adam for that so this was another bad one. Mea culpa folks. I'm scarface now.

episodes.title: Episode 22 - Ian's Shitty Impressions
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Ian Fidance joins us and demonstrates why his career as an impressionist has failed. He wore the same shirt as me which was from a ramen place that doesn't sell shirts to people. Me and Ian have a bond; the kind that homosexual men are jealous of.

episodes.title: Episode 21 - Hot Fresh Debate Instant Reaction
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Wow, immediate presidential debate reactions. Can you believe this trump guy? The hillary woman also? Jeeze louise. What a debate. Or was it? All these questions and more, with our recurring guest, Amber Frost.

episodes.title: Episode 20 - SD Tard
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Oopsie damn daisy folks. Guess who 1) forgot to take the last episode off the SD card so this one got cut short at 51 minutes and 2) forgot to upload the episode like I jokingly said I would at the beginning of it. Amber (my roommate) is back on the podcast and this time we don't let adam ask her a bunch of gay shit about the news

episodes.title: Ep. 19 - Rape Science
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: We get into some scientific stuff in this one. Ever hear of Bill Nye? Well imagine if he fucked. That's basically what this show is. about.

episodes.title: Episode 18 - Je Suis Charlie
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Honestly I've completely forgotten what we talked about on this one. I remember something about Charlie Hebdo. Mostly i was pissed that i had to take an uber to Stav's and the uber driver kept asking me bullshit questions. Its like motherfucker stop trying to be good at this job we all know it fucking sucks to drive for a ridesharing service.

episodes.title: Ep. 17 - Old Friends
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: I had to take a minute to cover some controversy that happened this week on facebook. I don't want to get into specifics but let's just say it involved a guy who may or may not be related to Seth Dickfield. Adam and stav wanted to bully me out of talking about it and they had nothing to discuss anyways so I feel like I came out the hero in this one.

episodes.title: Ep. 16 - Back In Business
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: After a week long hiatus the crew is back and it hasn't been a long enough vacation. Wardell joins us and screams into the microphone making it very hard to edit this episode. But its online now. We talk about a lot of the same stuff we've already covered on the podcast.

episodes.title: 15 - Another Girl Episode
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Melissa stokoski joins us so I can yell about the aaron glaser rape thing with a woman in the room, which is how you get away with being problematic on the radio. I learned this from Ant.

episodes.title: Episode 14 - Cum Town After Dark
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Im fucking tired as shit and i hate hAVing to edit and upload this gay shit every week and write a description. We talked about the usual stuff I think. So it's racist. Oh and I forgot to include the audio but I beat stav in roast battle. Because I'm better than he is.

episodes.title: Episode 13 - Just For Laughs Recap
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Back from a hot week in Montreal - super hot, lots of good industry buzz about Cum Town - the boys figure out which race is the next to be genocided via truck. Another late episode folks. Sometimes life gets in the way you know? Sometimes you forget what day it is because you keep autisticly buying power tools.

episodes.title: Episode 12 - Overconfidence
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Coming in hot off last weeks killer episode with David Cross we'd thought it'd be nice to take it easy and wait till the last day possible before recording again. None of us did anything this weekend. I built a desk. I'm proud of it but you can't appreciate it over a podcast so I wasn't about to just describe the desk I built for an hour. Stav was late because he bought a sandwich.

episodes.title: Ep. 11 - David Cross
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: This is the David Cross episode. David Cross was the guest. Yes for real. No it's not a character. The real David Cross came on the show. We really broke comedy down with him, pro style. Solid interview. And its a day early because last weeks episode was a day late. David Cross

episodes.title: Ep. 10 - Killing Garfield
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Sorry for the delay everyone, i was actually busy at uh, the black people matter protests. I was protesting for black people so I didn't have time to upload this one, which was also delayed because Kurt Metzger rescheduled. Amber Frost (of the Baffler and some other places) joined in. Amber is cool but we wasted her insight by making her talk about gay shit that we like. We're gonna do a bonus episode this week to make up for it.

episodes.title: Ep. 9 - Technical Difficulties
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: (PLEASE REDOWNLOAD) Well this one's jammed packed with content folks. Jim Norton joined us for the first half, but then the second half of his episode got fucked up when I forgot to change the batteries in the four track. So our good friend Felix of Chapo Trapo House joined us and then I fucked up the second half while exporting it in Audition so please redownload this one.

episodes.title: Ep. 8 - The Eighth Episode
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: The 8th episode. We get really, really deep into this whole Brexit thing. Really insightful takes about Jeremy Corvair and Johnathan Primbles or whoever. And the guy with the hair. We had to use a conference room so theres an echo that makes this one almost unlistenable. Thanks.

episodes.title: Ep. 7  - Autism Powers
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Our biggest celeb get yet: the entire cast of Austin Powers joins us to discuss online harassment after Jim Norton cancelled when he found out the name of the podcast. We discuss this elusive Dickfield character. And I think we mention that new Independence Day movie.

episodes.title: Ep. 6 - Not Soon Enough
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: The boys hold a special session, same as our usual time, to discuss the damn news this week. Adam returns, and he's not as bad this time.

episodes.title: Ep. 5 - Cum Angels
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Ive had to type out this description nine times because the podcast host is fucked up and wont upload the episode and I'm not typing it out again. Bonnie was on, shes great. I want to go to sleep

episodes.title: Ep. 4 - Beef Squashers
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: After some trouble in paradise, Adam is left as the only Cum Boy. Dickfield has a medical emergency, and Adam meets Dickfield's very outspoken cousin. Will Cum Town ever be the same? Find out on the final episode of America's Most Beloved Podcast

episodes.title: Ep. 3 - The Sleepy Boys
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Dan Soder (@DanSoder) is our first bonafide guest. He's got a real radio show on Sirius XM (the Bonfire), and he's on television folks (Billions, Showtime), but you can tell from our friendly rapport that he considers both me and Stav to be contemporaries, and by extension, also famous. Check out his new special on Comedy Central and buy his new album on iTunes.

episodes.title: Real Hip Hop
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Live from Stav's office where they let us use one of the conference rooms, official Cum Boy Adam Friedland (@AdamFriedland) joins us to discuss cumming in his own face and why he can't cum on other faces now. We talk about how Muslims go to the bathroom (but not in a racist way), Youtube comments (in a racist way), Chaturbate, and Iran (also racist). Also includes a special appearance by New York comedian Seth Dickfield and other rude caricatures.

episodes.title: The Original Cum Boys
episodes.author: Nick Mullen
episodes.summary: Cum Boys NYC Originals Nick and Stav sit down and start a podcast. This one is different than other podcasts where two guys talk about people you don't know. We get real dude. We take this shit seriously.
